artist: Suzuki Harunobu; Author: Komatsuya Hyakki; Publisher: Nishimuraya Yohachi
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Elegant Erotic Mane'emon (Fūryū enshoku Mane'emon 風流艶色真似ゑもん)
text: A couple entwined while listening to a blind shamisen player at the Ikaho hot spring in Kozuke Province, at right Mane'emon dries his head after emerging from the bath.
title: Hot Springs at Ikaho, No. 8 from the book Elegant Erotic Mane'emon (Fūryū enshoku Mane'emon), vol. 1
